agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Defense & Veterans' Affairs TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess Monday, March 18, 2019 PLACE: E1.026 CHAIR: Rep. Dan Flynn HB 166 Moody Relating to waiver programs for recipients of the Purple Heart provided by toll project entities. HB 584 White | et al. Relating to a program to facilitate, through the issuance and use of electronic toll collection transponders, free or discounted toll project use available to certain military personnel. HB 1656 Kacal Relating to the issuance of 173rd Airborne Brigade specialty license plates. HB 2039 Shine Relating to the issuance of specialty license plates to Master Army Aviators. HB 1969 Clardy Relating to the designation of the portion of State Highway 7 in Nacogdoches County as the Bataan and Corregidor Veterans Memorial Highway. HB 2241 Tinderholt Relating to hazardous duty pay for security officers employed by the Texas Military Department. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
